name: Kinfolk magazine vol 10
description:
"Age is an Issue"

This winter edition of Kinfolk—The Aged Issue—is dedicated to all things that get better with time: loved ones, food, family traditions and a good bottle of wine. The Kinfolk team explores how the older folks in our lives can teach us how to live more fully and how to embrace each new candle on our cake with style and grace. As some anonymous old chap once said, “Age is an issue of mind over matter. If you don’t mind, it doesn’t matter.” While many magazines pressure readers to hang on to youth, Kinfolk investigates how our lives are enriched by the people, meals and traditions of things past. One writer considers the inevitable day you realize you’re turning into your mother, while another reflects on the way life—like fruit—is about picking that perfectly ripe moment. Chefs share family recipes they’ve perfected over time, classic recipes updated for the modern era and a holiday menu that's easy to chew. There are gray hairs and salt-and-pepper beards, napping tips and ancient culinary tools. The connection? Everything in this issue gets better, or tastier, with age.

Kinfolk caters to a growing readership of young artists and food enthusiasts by focusing on simple ways to spend time together.

Each issue combines lyrical essays, recipes, interviews, personal stories and practical tips with a keen attention to design and details.

“Kinfolk is a food magazine about people. Kinfolk is about
gatherings, the meetings of minds around the table and
the rituals that surround eating, rather than big blow-out
meals and complex culinary feasts.”

144 pages, offset-printed, perfect bound, full colour on uncoated paper. Printed in the USA.

name: red woven lamp kit
description:
A simple, vintage-style braided lamp cord with an e27 socked is a beautiful thing. Marry this with an Edison lightbulb, and mason jar pendant or an industrial bulb cage and you'll find yourself in lighting heaven. 

Our braided lamp cords come with a standard Australian plug, 4m of fabric covered cord, and a simple bakelite e27 screw socket. 

Hang from a hook on the ceiling, a bracket on the wall, hat stands, bed frames, or wherever your imagination takes you. 

*bulb not included... jars and cages sold separately.

name: vintage style egg basket
description:
A gorgeous French-style wire basket with traditional coiled handle. The large size means you can use it to store eggs, vegetables & fruit, toys, or craft supplies. Custom made with sturdy iron wire, this is a timeless piece for your kitchen bench - or anywhere else you'd like to put it. 

Size: 20cm x 20cm x 25cm

name: moonshine mug + solid gold lid
bakers twine
description:
• made from 100% cotton, our bakers twine  is soft to the touch, nice and strong
  • bio-degradable and earth-friendly
  • 21 colours to choose from in various 2ply and 3ply constructions
  • perfect for gift wrapping, party favours, food packaging or craft projects
  • aprox. 100 metres of twine on each spool
    Check out our Twine Styling board on Pinterest for more was to use our huge range of bakers twine

name: cast iron skillet
description: Heavy cast iron frying pan with a diameter of 25cm (approx 9") The cast iron handle allows this skillet to move from stove top to oven to campfire and is formed with an eyelet so it can be hung up. The pan comes pre-seasoned and ready for use. Insulated red handle mit comes included. Check our Cast Iron Skillet pinterest board for dozens of recipe ideas that can be made in your new skillet!

name: 25 bright paper straws
black woven lamp kit
description:
A simple, vintage-style braided lamp cord with an e27 socked is a beautiful thing. Marry this with an Edison lightbulb, and mason jar pendant or an industrial bulb cage and you'll find yourself in lighting heaven. 

Our braided lamp cords come with a standard Australian plug, 4m of fabric covered cord, and a simple bakelite e27 screw socket. 

Hang from a hook on the ceiling, a bracket on the wall, hat stands, bed frames, or wherever your imagination takes you. 

*bulb not included... jars and cages sold separately.

name: Falcon enamel tea pot
description:
The classic Falcon teapot design in white with cobalt blue trim is manufactured from heavyweight steel and thicker enamel for extra durability.

Falcon Enamelware uses porcelain fused onto heavy-gauge steel, making it durable, smooth and lightweight. The blue and white Teapot can hold 1.5L, is dishwasher-safe and oven-safe too, and can be used on gas and electric hobs.

Materials: Enamelware (Porcelain fused onto Steel) 
Dimensions: Height: 16cm (including lid) x Width: 20cm (spout to handle)

name: Ball heritage collection blue mason jar
framed 3d bathymetric map of Moreton Bay
description: These bathymetric (water topography) maps are each hand made by local industrial designer Tom Percy, who takes the art of cartography to a whole new level. Tom's 3 dimensional maps are a precise work of art depicting Moreton Bay, the Brisbane River, Stradbroke Island, and all the other contours of the Bayside. They are fascinating, striking human depictions of the natural world and a beautiful way of displaying data. Deep Blue Maps are a fantastic way to share 'secret' camping and fishing spots or even landmarks to be discovered. They're a real conversation piece, and a great gift for hard-to-shop-for Brisbane boys (and design savvy girls) in your life. Size: 675mm by 500mm by 40mm Each map comes framed in white wood grain. Colours are cream white and blue. (We can also do one in brass for you for a cool 9k!) Available to be shipped to anywhere in Australia. Each map is custom made, so if you'd like to discuss any preferences, please get in touch with me via the contact section and I'll pass your message on to Tom, the artisan cartographer. For more information about Tom and how he makes his maps, you can check out our blog post on Deep Blue Maps over here. *Our 10% 'Welcome to the List' gift code is not valid on this piece of art.

name: e27 light cage
description:
This black cage for your pendant light is made from solid metal with a protective coating. 

Brighten up your room or verandah with this cool, industrial style fixture that looks just as good switched off as it does switched on.  

Cage dimensions: hight 190mm x width 120mm

Fits onto an e27 lamp holders and comes with two clamp screws to hold the cage firmly around the housing.

name: mason jar lamp kit
description:
Our mason jar lamp kits include:

1 x 4m vintage style braided lamp cord with e27 socket
1 x specially designed vented mason jar lid to fit the lamp to the jar
1 x wide mouth mason quart jar

This simple, vintage-style light is design is fully Pinterest worthy. 

Hang from a hook on the ceiling, a bracket on the wall, hat stands, bed frames, or wherever your imagination takes you.

We recommend you use a 28 watt bulb with your mason jar lamp kit for a pleasant glow that won't make the glass jar too hot.

name: Kinfolk magazine vol 9
description:
"The Weekend Edition"

Do weekends still exist? Are people who have kids able to enjoy them? Issue 9 contains Kinkolk's usual mix of beautiful photo essays, recipes, illustrated guides, interviews and profiles of makers, shops and people, along with lots of discussion about how people spend their weekends, ideas for ways to use your leisure time and how to find the ultimate work-play balance. 144 Pages. 

Kinfolk caters to a growing readership of young artists and food enthusiasts by focusing on simple ways to spend time together.

Each issue combines lyrical essays, recipes, interviews, personal stories and practical tips with a keen attention to design and details.

“Kinfolk is a food magazine about people. Kinfolk is about 
gatherings, the meetings of minds around the table and 
the rituals that surround eating, rather than big blow-out 
meals and complex culinary feasts.”

name: vintage Japanese fishing floats
description:
Sea-green vintage Japanese fishing floats in nets, each one in possession of its own unique character. 

Size: approx 5.5cm in diameter.

name: quart mason jar
Falcon enamel tumbler with red rim
description:
A sleek white enamel tumbler with vibrant red rim by the classic British brand Falcon Enamelware (est. 1920).

These cups keep cold food cold and hot food hot, so lay them our on your table with a pitcher of ice water or fresh squeezed juice, a big pot of hot soup or your morning oatmeal. 

Use them for styling wild flowers posies, keeping pencils organised on your desk, or as cutlery storage on your kitchen bench.  

Tumblers are 9cm tall and hold 310ml.

name: Falcon enamel prep set
description:
This gorgeous Falcon Prep Set features 6 pieces to help you prepare and serve meals in style. You get 5 nesting bowls in white enamel with cobalt blue trim as well as the classic white and blue trimmed colander. (It's my personal favourite!) 

Falcon enamelware is renowned the world over as the traditional leader in the finest quality enamelware. Established in 1920 in Britain not only does it look good in the kitchen the quality of the porcelain fused onto heavy gauge steel gives it amazing smoothness and durability.  Falcon Ware is an iconic brand and design classic that suits all sorts of home decor styles. 

Dishwasher and oven safe to 270C/530F. Falcon enamelware is also suitable for use also on gas and electric cooktops.

Falcon Prep Set includes:

24cm colander
24cm mixing bowl
18cm mixing bowl
16cm mixing bowl
14cm mixing bowl
12cm mixing bowl

name: Falcon enamel plate
description:
• white Falcon enamelware 26cm dinner plate with cobalt blue rim.
  • Enamelware is porcelain fused onto heavy-gauge steel, giving it many admirable qualities - durability, smoothness and chemical-resistance. It can assume brilliant, long-lasting colours, and cannot burn. If you drop it, it may chip but it won’t break. Dishwasher-safe and oven-safe up to 530F / 270C, it can also be used on gas and electric hobs.
  • This design icon has been produced by the British Falcon company since the 1920s.
  •  Reminiscent of camping holidays and Australian shearers' mess halls, these plates are perfect for picnics, camping, or as a sturdy and nostalgic addition to the kitchen cupboard.

Dishwasher-safe and oven-safe up to 530F / 270C, it can also be used on gas and electric hobs.
  • This design iconic has been produced by the British Falcon company since the 1920s.
  •  Reminiscent of camping holidays and Australian shearers' mess halls, these high quality baking dishes are a sturdy and beautiful addition to any kitchen cupboard. Use them on the stove top and in the oven for baking, roasting, warming and serving too.

  These mugs retain heat really well, so if you love your billy tea steaming hot, they're definitely for you!

name: quilted half pint jam jar
description:
- Ball Mason regular mouth Half Pint (237ml) Quilted Crystal Jar.

- Ideal for storing jams, jellies, sauces, and carrying around small snacks. 

- The pretty quilted crystal design makes these jars perfect for home decor projects, gift giving, and use as tiny dessert bowls - we love them for serving up yoghurt parfaits at brunch or pudding in the afternoon. 

- The jars come with a standard mason lid and can be used for home preserving. They also feature a little clear area of glass where you can stick a label.

- Jars can hold boiling water, are freezer, microwave (not the metal lids, obviously) and dishwasher safe. You can even bake in them.

name: pink woven lamp kit
description:
A simple, vintage-style braided lamp cord with an e27 socked is a beautiful thing. Marry this with an Edison lightbulb, and mason jar pendant or an industrial bulb cage and you'll find yourself in lighting heaven. 

Our braided lamp cords come with a standard Australian plug, 4m of fabric covered cord, and a simple bakelite e27 screw socket. 

Hang from a hook on the ceiling, a bracket on the wall, hat stands, bed frames, or wherever your imagination takes you.

name: daisy cut mason jar lid
description:
Antique gold daisy cut lids sit all regular mouth mason jars (with a 65mm opening). 

These lids do fit our quilted jam jars and moonshine mugs. They do not fit our wide mouth pint and quart jars. 

Daisy cut lids are pretty for decoration - pop a paper straw in for a super cute drinking experience, fill the jar with dried lavender and let the scent waft through your room, or create a casual floral arrangement by sticking wild flowers stems through the 'petals' of the lid. You can also tie string or wire through the small hole of the lid to create a hanging lantern with a lit tealight inside your jar.

name: blue mason jar print tea towel
description:
A soft, white, hand-made tea towel with mason jar print.

Made from organic cotton and machine washable.

Perfect for giving as a gift, use to dry dishes in style, or frame it and hang in your kitchen as art.

Dimensions: 74cm x 71cm 

These towels feature the original artwork of Cara and Jason Hibbs of Oh, Little Rabbit in Oregon who hand print each one. They are eco friendly artisans, using organic fabrics and high quality, non-toxic water based inks.

name: quilted 4oz jam jar
description:
- Ball Mason regular mouth 4oz (125ml) Quilted Crystal Jars. 

- Ideal for storing jams, jellies, sauces, and carrying around small snacks. 

- The pretty quilted crystal design makes these jars perfect for home decor projects, gift giving, and use as tiny dessert bowls - we love them for serving up yoghurt parfaits at brunch or pudding in the afternoon. 

- The jars come with a standard mason lid and can be used for home preserving. They also feature a little clear area of glass where you can stick a label.

name: tri-colour bakers twine
hanging glass terrarium
description:
These terrariums are made from hand blown glass and have flat bottoms so they can either be hung with twine or sat on a flat surface. 

Perfect for housing succulents or tea lights. You can also fill the bottoms with water and float a bloom inside. On their own or clustered in groups they make an incredible centre piece sat on or hanging above your table. 

Tear drop Size: 19 x 9 x 5cm 
Round Size:  11 x 10 x 4.5cm

name: bonsai shears
description:
Traditional Japanese bonsai pruning shears with a beautiful vintage design. 

Made from durable steel alloy with black rust-resistant finish. Super sharp blades are designed for precision and quick plant healing.

Perfect for use in the garden and the kitchen.

name: 3 mini terra cotta pots
description:
Little terra cotta pots, perfect for starting seedlings and growing succulents.

Paint them, use them to store little bits around the house, or bake up a batch of muffins in them! (tutorial coming soon to The Spring Blog)

We have two sizes: 7cm or 5cm diameter (measured at top of pot)

name: medium wooden trug
description:
A traditional Ball & Burgon wooden trug made from metasequoia (also known as water larch).

Perfect for harvesting and carrying fresh fruit and vegetables to the kitchen.

Hand made near Sheffield, England from strips of shaped wood and held in place by solid brass pins and screws.

Length 40cm x width 23cm.

name: glass thickshake straws
large wooden trug
description:
A Ball & Burgon large wooden trug made from metasequoia (also known as water larch).

Perfect for harvesting and carrying fresh fruit and vegetables to the kitchen.

Hand made near Sheffield, England from strips of shaped wood and held in place by solid brass pins and screws.

Length 57cm x width 27cm.

description:
• pack of 12 long and elegant hand dipped 100% natural beeswax candles
  • beeswax is completely edible so you'll never worry about toxic yucky chemicals melting onto your cake!
  • lovely yellow colour and beautiful honey scent
  • size: 12.5cm tall, approximately 5mm diameter
  • made in the USA

name: wooden honey dipper
description:
A natural wooden honey dipper that looks beautiful on a brunch table or tea tray.

Dipper is 15cm tall and 2.5cm wide at its base.

name: gingham mason jar lids
description:
Red and white gingham regular mouth mason jar lids fit our moonshine mugs, making them airtight.

They're reusable and fit on any standard mouth mason jar. (These are not wide mouth lids and they do not make a seal on our moonshine mugs!) 

1 gingham lid + 1 gingham band make up each set.

name: glass straw cleaning brush
description:
• medical grade nylon tipped stainless steel cleaning brushes
  • a simple, reusable solution to cleaning your glass straws
  • 1/4" diameter for 9.5 mm juice straws, 1/2" diameter for 12 mm thickshake straws

25 chevron paper straws
25 Christmas paper straws

description:
Disposable wooden spoons decorated with water based, non-toxic paint.

Perfect for picnics, parties, and Pinterest-worthy food styling.

Each pack includes a mix dotty, striped, and chevron patterns in a single colour

Spoons Length : 15.6cm

name: 12 painted wooden knives
description:
Disposable wooden knives decorated with water based, non-toxic paint.

Perfect for picnics, parties, and Pinterest-worthy food styling.

Each pack includes a mix of dotty, striped, and chevron patterns in a single colour.

Knife Length : 16.5cm

description:
Disposable wooden forks decorated with water based, non-toxic paint.

Perfect for picnics, parties, and Pinterest-worthy food styling.

Each pack comes with a mix of dotty, striped, and chevron patterns in a single colour. 

Fork Length: 15.7cm

name: 24 large eco-friendly paper plates
description:
Picnic in eco style on large plates made from 100% unbleached bamboo pulp. 

Plates are thick and durable enough to hold a large serving of moist food, hot or cold. 

No trees were harmed in the making of these plates!

size: 26cm diameter, natural colour

name: 12 small eco-friendly paper plates
description:
Picnic in eco style on large plates made from 100% unbleached bamboo pulp. 

Plates are thick and durable, perfect for salads, side dishes, and slices of cake. 

No trees were harmed in the making of these plates!

size: 17.5cm diameter, natural colour

name: 6 large eco-friendly paper bowls
description:
Picnic in eco style with these large serving bowls made from 100% unbleached sugarcane pulp. 

Bowls are durable and large enough to hold a side dishes to share, chips, fruit, or a big salad for one. 

Sugarcane bowls have no plastic coating and are fully compostable in 30-90 days. They are suitable for both hot and cold foods, oil and water resistant, and microwave safe. 

No trees were harmed in the making of these bowls!

size: top diameter 210mm x 60mm high natural colour

name: 10 little chevron treat bags
10 little polka dot treat bags
Original Crown Mill A5 luxury writing paper
description:
• White Original Crown Mill A5 pad with 50 sheets lightly bound at the top with glue for easy removal
  • 15cm x 21cm, 100gsm, watermarked laid-line finish paper. Ruled guide sheet included
  • With a lightly ribbed texture and matte finish, this paper is timeless and perfect for all types of correspondence.
  • Suitable for use with all types of pens and laser jet printing
  • The paper is bleed proof and fountain pen friendly. There is no ink feathering.
  • Matching envelopes available
    Original Crown Mill Paper is a very famous Belgian paper brand known to be the gold standard of European writing paper. It is simple, sophisticated, and very high quality. The Pelletier Company has been producing Original Crown Mill luxury paper in Brussels since 1870 and the traditional finish of this beautiful product today replicates paper commissioned by Charles II from the monks of La Hulpe monastery in the 17th century.

name: Original Crown Mill tissue lined envelopes
description:
• 25 Original Crown Mill white tissue lined envelopes
  • 162mm x 115mm. Ideal for A5 paper.
  • Each set has 25 envelopes and is acid free and pH neutral to ensure archival quality.
  • Suitable for use with all types of pens and laser jet printing
  • The paper is bleed proof and fountain pen friendly. There is no ink feathering.
  • Matching envelopes available
    Original Crown Mill Paper is a very famous Belgian paper brand known to be the gold standard of European writing paper. It is simple, sophisticated, and very high quality. The Pelletier Company has been producing Original Crown Mill luxury paper in Brussels since 1870 and the traditional finish of this beautiful product today replicates paper commissioned by Charles II from the monks of La Hulpe monastery in the 17th century.

name: Original Crown Mill silk tissue note card set in red
Original Crown Mill silk tissue note card set in navy
super fine blue merino shawl
description:
hand stitched with silk thread dyed with Japanese indigo. 

38cm x 130cm

name: organic merino and milk baby blanket
description:
These cuddly wraps are made from a special weave of super fine organic Australian merino wool mixed with milk protein. The wool is sourced from farms in NSW and Victoria committed to animal welfare and the chemical-free treatment of all their produce.  

This fabric mix has incredible properties and was originally engineered to give tiny premature babies  in hospital the feeling of comfort and warmth before they’re strong enough to be held by their parents. It’s super light, warm, non-irritating on even the most sensitive skin and incredibly comforting. 

This fabric is also naturally fire retardant,  anti-fungal and anti-bacterial. 

Each blanket is hand stitched using silk threads dyed with edible native plants and fruits. 

The organic baby blankets are washable (gently) and can be hung to dry.

Blankets are made right here in Brisbane by Studio 88. They are 120cm x 65cm.

name: scrabble tile fridge magnet set
description:
With Scrabble magnets you can leave messages on the refrigerator door and score points while you're at it. Write out lovely notes to your friends and kids, or go the practical route and spell out the weekly chore wheel.

Get creative and use these letters in other places too - we love sticking our guests names to enamel plates and cups at dinner parties.     

100 wooden tiles in each set featuring the real Scrabble game's letter distribution.

name: alphabet stamp set
patterned sticker paper
description:
Get dozens of patterns and shapes to decorate your cards, gift wrap, fridge door in one cute package. 

These stickers have the texture of paper and are covered with mixed washi tape style designs.

8 sheets of sticker paper per package
sheet size: 100mm x 160mm

name: camera stamp set
lace doily stamps
description:
Beautiful lace doily stamps, perfect for making your own cards and gift tags. 

If you're feeling extra crafty, try pressing them into home-made clay tags or your favourite shortbread cookie recipe for a really pretty decorative effect.

Rubber stamps on wooden base - 45 x 45mm

name: number stamp set
50 scalloped white shipping tags
description:
• crisp shipping tags with scalloped edge
  • perfect for writing or stamping on
  • ideal for use as labels in your pantry or on gifts
  • choose from white or brown kraft paper
  • size: 9 x 4 cm
  • fasten to your gift with our lovely selection of twines
    Check out our Paper Styling board on Pinterest for more ideas of how to use these tags

name: 10 metal rimmed tags
description:
These iconic tags have typically been used to label spare keys in junks draws across North America...

But we love using them as gift tags, hanging them from garlands, and decorating them with pretty paper and photos.

Each tag is 5.5cm in diameter

name: 50 small kraft tags
description:
Made from sturdy 350g kraft card, these small tags are perfect for labelling gifts, jars, and leaving notes around the house. Decorate them with stamps, stickers, fabric tape, or embroidery to personalise birthday and Christmas gifts or wedding favours.

packs of 50
each card has a punched hole 
size: 4x7cm

name: gift cards
12 cake flags
description:
Festive flags are a beautiful way to decorate cakes, cupcakes, pancakes, or just about anything else on your table when it's time to celebrate.

We make custom cake flags and bunting for you, so have a look at our collection of fabric tapes and twines to choose the colours and patterns you'd like us to use. 

Or, to make things simpler, just let us know your colour scheme in the notes at checkout and we'll do the rest.

name: 25 itty bitty wood clothes pegs
cotton tape
striped fabric tape
metalic glitter tape

name: gingham fabric tape
description: cotton tape with strong adhesive backing perfect for decorating gifts, photos, crafts, wedding diy and even bottles and jars choose from 6 gingham patterns 1.5cmm wide x 5m long     Check out our Ribbon & Tape Styling board on Pinterest for more ways to decorate with printed fabric tape

name: lace tape
natural jute twine
chalk board pegs
description:
Little chalk boards attached to clothes pegs for you to label and clip anywhere you like. 

We use them to mark our pots of herbs growing in the garden, label glasses at parties, sort lost socks that come our of the washer on our clothesline, sort receipts, and lots more. 

They're also very popular in shops and restaurants for marking prices and tables. 

Write on these boards with chalk and wipe them clean with a damp towel.

metalic stamp pads

• these ink pads are perfect fAor all your stamping crafts and gift wrapping
  • oil based for use on fabric, wood, and paper
  • each pad measures 7.5 cm x 5.2 cm
  • choose from gold and silver
  • we recommend that you clean your stamp before using your pad as it can affect the colour

name: large bobbin
description: - lovely vintage style large wooden bobbin 8.5cm x 12.5cm - use them to wrap beautiful bits of cotton and ribbon, set them on your table as candle holders, display them among your treasures. - they're very rustic and each is slightly different with some rough patches on top and stain drips. Check out our Twine Styling board on Pinterest for more ways to style and use bobbins.

name: pompom trim + wooden bobbin
description:
•  fun and cheerful, pompom fringe can be glued or sewn almost anywhere!
  • perfect for decorating gifts, crafts, sewing projects or on its own as a garland
  • a range of colours and sizes available

neon stamp pads

name: stamp pads
